name: Michael Jackson's Awesome Adventure
description:
Second game I ever made.

I made every art in the game, besides MJ, it's asset was ripped from the Moonwalker game for Mega Drive.

Most of the music I also took from the game's soundtrack.

The sfx I edited from a compilation of MJ's moans.

Most of the controls are explained in game, there is a way to mute if you press M, or click on the music note icon in the top right corner of the screen.
